def get_digit(digit):                               
    current = result_label['text']
    new = current + str(digit) 
    result_label.config(text=new)
def clear():                                        # FUnction of clear the Screen 
    result_label.config(text='')
def get_operator(op):                               #Function of operator working 
    global first_number,operator 
    first_number = int(result_label['text'])
    operator = op

label: clear
peekOfCode:
def clear():                                        # FUnction of clear the Screen 
    result_label.config(text='')
def get_operator(op):                               #Function of operator working 
    global first_number,operator 
    first_number = int(result_label['text'])
    operator = op
    result_label.config(text='')
def get_result():                                     # Function to get the result 
    global first_number,second_number,operator
    second_number = int(result_label['text'])

label: get_operator
peekOfCode:
def get_operator(op):                               #Function of operator working 
    global first_number,operator 
    first_number = int(result_label['text'])
    operator = op
    result_label.config(text='')
def get_result():                                     # Function to get the result 
    global first_number,second_number,operator
    second_number = int(result_label['text'])
    if operator == '+':
        result_label.config(text=str(first_number+second_number))

label: get_result
root
peekOfCode:
root = Tk()
root.title("Calculator")            #Title of the GUI
root.geometry('280x380')            #to set the size of GUI screen
root.resizable(0,0)
root.configure(background='black')   #To set the background Colour
result_label = Label(root,text='',bg='black',fg='white')
result_label.grid(row=0,column=0,columnspan=5,pady=(50,25),sticky='w')                           #Make grid USing .grid
result_label.config(font=('verdana',30,'bold'))
btn7 = Button(root,text='7',bg='grey',fg='white',width=5,height=2,command=lambda :get_digit(7))  #Applied Button 
btn7.grid(row=1,column=0)
